8.3.20  9:03 pm   are you a time traveler 

      yes, time is required for travel

8.3.20  8:53 pm   Thoughts on seagulls

      sea equivalent of the land gull

8.3.20  8:35 pm   How are you so sure everything's going to be okay or even better than that

      i distinctly remember catching a glimpse of the source code, although i don't remember when

8.3.20  8:20 pm   Would you do it all?

      oh hell yeah

8.3.20  8:12 pm   would you delete ohio if given the choice

      no

8.3.20  8:03 pm   Opinion on Idaho.

      this might not be what you want to hear, but it's smaller than michigan

8.3.20  7:48 pm   What's your opinion on crocodilians?

      never heard of them

8.3.20  7:35 pm   How do I avoid the sun?

      you could hide in the earth's core

8.3.20  7:25 pm   i have no hobbies how do i find a hobbies

      have you tried taping spaghetti to the wall

8.3.20  6:44 pm   What is your favorite way to get where you are going?

      just appear there

8.3.20  6:05 pm   In your song "you're free to do whatever you need to" what is the sound that plays in the beggining that sounds like an alarm

The notes are something like:
Ab,Ab,Ab,Gb,G,Ab,Ab,Ab,Gb,G,Ab,Ab,A,Ab

For some reason i really like that sound and i'd like to know what it is or what its name is.

      alarm is a pretty good name

8.3.20  5:29 pm   Based on your answer on 8.2.20  4:07 am what is this trauma caused by?

      oh just being myself

8.3.20  5:19 pm   People keep saying you predicted how 2020 turned out in your music video "i just did a bad thing". What are your thoughts for this?

      it's easy to make it look like things in the past predicted the future. just choose the thing that matches, and ignore all the other stuff. i have another song called 'mount st helens is about to blow up' but that didn't happen did it

8.3.20  5:12 pm   Bill, I was sad to hear about the tiktok imposter contacting you. We tried to report the fake account, but it requires the name of the real account to do so. I know yours is "notbillwurtz", but it doesn't show up when searching in the report function. I don't know why, might be because there is no content. We are able to find it outside of the reporting form. Just wanted to let you know, to try to lend a hand.

     please use one of the other options, "posting misleading information", or "other", and in the description, say they are impersonating me, and give them the official billwurtz email address, billwurtz@billwurtz.com, so the admins can contact me and confirm that 'billwurtzofficial' on tiktok is NOT me, and they're stealing my videos and identity

8.3.20  4:20 pm   what is your opinion on garfield

      he can never die

8.3.20  4:16 pm   Dear Steve, How did you climb this Mountain??

      my name is not steve, but that's ok, sometimes i climb mountains by pretending to be named steve

8.3.20  4:14 pm   how far away are the stars

      pretty close actually

8.3.20  4:11 pm   Is air Breathable water

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.3.20  4:04 pm   What's your favourite measurement unit?

      the planck

      what the heck is going on

8.3.20  3:47 pm   Bill you are a very interesting man 

      we'll see about that

8.3.20  3:42 pm   What is your favorite game?

      what the heck is going on

8.3.20  3:37 pm   is bread a soup?

      no but if you mix bread and soup you can get a third totally different thing

8.3.20  2:51 pm   Regarding your YouTube channel, people are figuring out that your first word was "die" and that your last word was "everyone". They are scared of this revelation, as your ultimate goal was to say "die everyone". What do you think about it? 

      wouldn't it have been easier to just say that in the same video

8.3.20  2:44 pm   Hey bill if you wanna make your life easier when it comes to figuring out if something is a multiple of 7, there's a convenient way to use your subtract/add a multiple of 7 trick that makes it much easier.   Say your number is 30583 for example.   Now we know that 21 is a multiple of 7 right?   That means anything times 21 is also a multiple of 7.   So what we can do is just subtract the number by 21 times the last digit of the number, in this case 3.   So 21*3=63 which means we can do 30583-63->30520 then divide by 10 to get 3052.   Then repeat.   3052-42->3010->301 301-21->280->28 which is divisible by 7 which means 30583 is divisible by 7.  Now whenever we are subtracting by 21 times the last digit and then dividing by 10, what we are essentially doing is taking the last digit, doubling it, then subtracting the rest of the number by t he doubl ed last digit.   So like instead of doing 30583-63->30520->3058 what you can instead do is a short cut for 30583 and take the last digit 3, double it to get 6, and then subtract the rest of the number by that doubled digit, 3058-6->3052, and then just keep subtracting the rest of the number by the last digit doubled until you get to a number you know is divisible by 7.

      i would just go to 3059, 301, 35. so 437

8.3.20  2:20 pm   is soup a cereal

      pretty good how are you

8.3.20  2:08 pm   are you making up some of these questions yourself?

      absolutely not

8.3.20  1:55 pm   why is there a sign on your wall that says "240"?

      it's actually 3 separate signs, 2, 4, and 0. they were already there when i moved in, but in a different order. so i switched them to an order that was a little more interesting. then i realized that they are actually accordion-style stacks of numbers, so i changed it to something entirely different that surely no one was expecting

8.3.20  1:41 pm   have you ever eaten a taboo onion fruit?

      no but i can see why you would think that

8.3.20  1:38 pm   I really like your editing style, can you explain your creative process while making your projects?

      sure

8.3.20  1:07 pm   hey i was just wondering if you knew how to play chess,

     yes

     and if you were thinking about incorporating it into your music at some point

      yes, even though i have done it before. especially for videos, because chess is a very visual game

8.3.20  1:06 pm   I'm getting back into writing... Any tips??

      let me know what you write. i am curious

8.3.20  1:05 pm   Why do we exist

      it seems no one could ever figure out how not to

8.3.20  1:02 pm   Ok so I can play guitar and sing harmonies to most of your songs, if you ever play a gig in Paris can I be your guest ?

      sure

8.3.20  12:58 pm   I listen to a lot of music, and when i sit down to write some new music, all i can do is imagine the sound of the new music. I'm thinking that, along the same lines, if I write or look at lots of music, I'll be able to imagine how the music looks AND sounds, creating an ultimate music writing combo. Is it more effective if I write lots of my own new stuff, or if write (or transcribe?) other people's music? Any advice?

      i've read your question 3 times and i still can't quite seem to understand it

8.3.20  12:54 pm   are you learning 3d animation and are you secretly a beaver

      secretly learning 3d animation, openly a beaver

8.3.20  12:14 pm   why doesn't steve's house have a door

      if unable to open your house, you are sometimes forced to open your mind

8.3.20  12:13 pm   how do you feel about giraffes

      not only tall, but also very wide

8.3.20  12:12 pm   what was in the fragile box in "unboxing video"?

      a calendar event .ics

8.3.20  12:00 pm   What was your inspiration to write "not so hard to do"?

      that was an attempt to remind myself that writing/recording songs should not be so hard to do

8.3.20  11:31 am   How many pieces of trash = 1 heap?

      just one, if it's positioned just right

8.3.20  11:20 am   What is the meaning of the Universe

      might be you

8.3.20  11:20 am   do you have any advice for a not too bad bassist? I've been practicing every day for the past 4 months. 

      make sure you are playing with songs. get song recordings and play them through a thin speaker, and put yourself through a bigger (bass-capable) speaker. either that or join a band, oh wait i was just informed it's 2020, year of solitude

8.3.20  11:15 am   When are you going to start making infinite videos again?

     pretty soon

     They brighten my day

8.3.20  11:07 am   hi bill do u have any tips for being more introspective and communicating that introspection? i am writing my college essays and having trouble articulating my identity 

      you could try doing some holy rituals, underground

8.3.20  11:07 am   Have you graduated from  3D animation school ?

      no but i've escaped

8.3.20  11:06 am   when are you going to start posting again? 

      right away

8.3.20  10:54 am   what is the best method to learn a new language?

      do mouth animations for it

8.3.20  10:16 am   why do i feel so normal to the point where I feel extra normal

      sounds like someone may have slipped a little something into your drink

8.3.20  9:14 am   What do you think of the lack of semicolons in Python?

      that means you can use them as much as you want, without having to escape
